trans-unit.source: Contains mutually exclusive <xref href="System.Windows.VisualState"></xref> objects and <xref href="System.Windows.VisualTransition"></xref> objects that are used to move from one state to another.
trans-unit.target: 包含互斥<xref href="System.Windows.VisualState"></xref>物件和<xref href="System.Windows.VisualTransition"></xref>用來從某一個狀態移至另一個物件。

trans-unit.source: Each VisualStateGroup contains a collection of <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> objects.
trans-unit.target: 每個 VisualStateGroup 包含的集合<xref:System.Windows.VisualState>物件。</xref:System.Windows.VisualState>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> contains a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> objects that specify how the control's appearance changes when the control is in a certain state.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.VisualState>包含的集合<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>指定控制項的外觀如何變更當控制項處於特定狀態的物件。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.VisualState>

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> might have a slightly different appearance when it is pressed than when it is not pressed.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>後未按下時，於按下可能會出現稍有不同的外觀。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: Two states that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> defines correspond to when it is pressed (`"Pressed"`) and when it is not (`"Normal"`).
trans-unit.target: 兩個指出<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>定義當按下時，對應到 (`"Pressed"`) 並不是 (`"Normal"`)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: You add <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> to a control by setting the `VisualStateManager.VisualStateGroups` attached property on the control.
trans-unit.target: 您將加入<xref:System.Windows.VisualState>藉由設定控制項`VisualStateManager.VisualStateGroups`附加在控制項上的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.VisualState>

trans-unit.source: You put states that are mutually exclusive to each other in the same VisualStateGroup.
trans-unit.target: 您放置互斥彼此相同 VisualStateGroup 中的狀態。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox> has two VisualStateGroup objects.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>有兩個 VisualStateGroup 物件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: One contains the states, `Normal`, `MouseOver`, `Pressed`, and `Disabled`.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個包含狀態， `Normal`， `MouseOver`， `Pressed`，和`Disabled`。

trans-unit.source: The other contains the states, `Checked`, `UnChecked`, and `Indeterminate`.
trans-unit.target: 另一個包含狀態， `Checked`， `UnChecked`，和`Indeterminate`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox> can be in states `MouseOver` and `UnChecked` at the same time, but it cannot be in the `MouseOver` and `Pressed` states at the same time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>可能處於狀態`MouseOver`和`UnChecked`在相同的時間，但不是能在`MouseOver`和`Pressed`一次的狀態。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: Although you can add <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> objects to any element, they are a particularly useful way to enable others to redefine the visual behavior of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>.
trans-unit.target: 雖然您可以新增<xref:System.Windows.VisualState>物件到任何項目，它們是特別有用的方法讓其他使用者可以重新定義的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>視覺行為</xref:System.Windows.VisualState>

trans-unit.source: If you create a custom control that uses a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, you can specify which states that control can be in by adding a <xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute> on its class definition.
trans-unit.target: 如果您建立的自訂控制項，會使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，您可以指定其中說明控制項可以處於加<xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute>在其類別定義。</xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: Then anyone who creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> for your control can add <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> objects to the template.
trans-unit.target: 然後建立新的人<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，請加入您的控制項可以<xref:System.Windows.VisualState>物件至範本。</xref:System.Windows.VisualState> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute> enables designer tools, such as Expression Blend, to expose the control's states.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute>可讓設計工具，例如 Expression Blend 時，若要公開控制項的狀態。</xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute>

trans-unit.source: States with the same <xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute.GroupName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> belong in the same VisualStateGroup.
trans-unit.target: 具有相同狀態<xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute.GroupName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬於相同 VisualStateGroup。</xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute.GroupName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to use VisualStateGroup objects in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何使用 VisualStateGroup 物件中的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，請參閱[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to create controls that use the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager>, see [Creating a Control That Has a Customizable Appearance](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何建立會控制該使用<xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager>，請參閱[建立具有可自訂外觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup.Transitions%2A> property contains <xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition> objects that are applied when the control transition between states that are defined in the VisualStateGroup.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup.Transitions%2A>屬性包含<xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition>控制項轉換之間狀態時，所套用的物件定義於 VisualStateGroup。</xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition> </xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup.Transitions%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.VisualStateGroup"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.VisualStateGroup"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.VisualState"></xref> that is currently applied to the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.VisualState"></xref>目前套用至控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.VisualState"></xref> that is currently applied to the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.VisualState"> </xref>目前套用至控制項。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after a control transitions to a different state.
trans-unit.target: 發生於之後控制項轉換成不同的狀態。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs after the control transitions to a new state and the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup.CurrentStateChanging> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 之後，控制會轉換成新的狀態就會發生此事件和<xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup.CurrentStateChanging>就會發生事件。</xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup.CurrentStateChanging>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a control starts transitioning to a different state.
trans-unit.target: 發生於控制項開始轉換至不同的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The event occurs when the control begins to transition states.
trans-unit.target: 當控制項開始轉換狀態時，就會發生的事件。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition> is applied to the state change, this event occurs when the transition begins.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition>會套用到狀態變更，此事件轉換開始時發生。</xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition> is not applied, this event occurs after the control transitions to the new state, but before the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup.CurrentStateChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition>未套用時，就會發生此事件控制項之前轉換至新的狀態後,<xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup.CurrentStateChanged>事件。</xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup.CurrentStateChanged> </xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.VisualStateGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定名稱<xref href="System.Windows.VisualStateGroup"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Control authors specify which states the control can be in by adding a <xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute> on its class definition.
trans-unit.target: 控制作者指定的狀態控制項加入時，可在<xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute>在其類別定義。</xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute>

trans-unit.source: States with the same <xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute.GroupName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> belong in the same <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>.
trans-unit.target: 具有<xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute.GroupName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>相同<xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>.</xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>屬於</xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute.GroupName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>相同的狀態

trans-unit.source: Set the Name of the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute.GroupName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定名稱<xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>值<xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute.GroupName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute.GroupName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Windows.VisualStateGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 名稱<xref href="System.Windows.VisualStateGroup"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of mutually exclusive <xref href="System.Windows.VisualState"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 取得的互斥集合<xref href="System.Windows.VisualState"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The collection of mutually exclusive <xref href="System.Windows.VisualState"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 互斥集合<xref href="System.Windows.VisualState"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.VisualTransition"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合<xref href="System.Windows.VisualTransition"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition> objects in Transitions are applied when the control transition between states that are defined in the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition>控制項切換狀態<xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>.</xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>中所定義時，會套用中轉換物件</xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition>

trans-unit.source: The collection of <xref href="System.Windows.VisualTransition"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.Windows.VisualTransition"></xref>物件。
